short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of scrolling up to 'Copy code' on ChatGPT? This extension adds a second button below code blocks for easy copying!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On ChatGPT, when you get a code output that you want to copy, you have to scroll up. This can be ANNOYING at times. So, this extension got created to help you copy code without any scrolling at all. Enjoy!
